General.Name: Commencement Bancorp Inc
General.Description: Commencement Bancorp Inc. operates as a bank holding company for Commencement Bank that provides various banking products and services for individuals, and small and midsized businesses in western Washington. It accepts non-interest-bearing, checking, demand, savings, NOW, money market, and time deposits, as well as certificates of deposit. The company also offers term loans, home equity loans and lines of credit, and personal reserve overdraft lines; commercial real estate loans, including residential 1-4 family, multi-family, commercial, construction, and land; government backed and term loans; credit and debit cards; and ATM services. In addition, it offers remote deposit capture, sweep accounts, lockbox remittance processing, positive pay, and automated clearing house origination services; merchant services; and online and mobile banking services. The company has branches in Tacoma, Enumclaw, Auburn, and Olympia, Washington. Commencement Bancorp Inc. was founded in 2006 and is based in Tacoma, Washington.
General.Address: 1102 Commerce Street, Tacoma, WA, United States, 98402
